messages.subject: Shinsengumimb.com is now open
messages.msgSnippet: shinsengumimb.com is an ezboard messageboard which will serve our community and attract new members.  The long term goal is to keep everyone united and drive
messages.messageBody:
shinsengumimb.com is an ezboard messageboard which will serve our
community and attract new members. The long term goal is to keep
everyone united and drive visitors to our homebase at
shinsengumihq.com...if this board is successful I will send invites to
Japanese messageboards

If you would for me to include a link to your site let me know and
provide a button as well.

There may be a few problems with the messageboard (I can't detect
anything because there have only been 2 posts)...if so just email me
secretarytocapt3@... and I will get to them Saturday

Anyone can VIEW the messageboard
however you must register at http://www.ezboard.com/ to POST
My rules are:
1) you must be atleast 18 just because recommendations for yaoi
stories may be posted
2) to please be respectful and abstain from the use of profanity
3) whenever possible include a link to wherever you got your info...if
you can't remember then it should go in the "folktales" section which
will house rumors
4) strict adherence to the code of bushido

*Personal Icon to 10x10 px
You have to upload your own icon and type in the URL exactly in your
profiles
Please do not steal other people's bandwidth...you can get an account
at www.geocities.com to host images

*Limit Personal Photo to 60x60 px I believe this will appear only on
your profile page

*Ranks/Titles
I can also designate ranks for you such as Daimyo, Chief, Captain,
Secretary, Accountant, Fundoshi Washer, Historian, Kenjutsu Teacher,
Jiujutsu Teacher, Harada's girl etc. You'll just have to register
then send me a personal message or email me at
secretarytocapt3@...

How to post a new topic
1. To post a new topic, click on the New Topic button Shinsengumi haori :)
2. Once you have clicked the New Topic button it will take you to a
page where you enter your message and subject title. When you are
finished, you can choose to preview your topic by checking the preview
box next to the Add Post button

How to edit a post
Only the original author, administrator or moderator can edit a post
on a community.
1. To edit a message, click on the Edit link or image (usually a
checkmark).
2. Once you have clicked the Edit link it will take you to a page
where you can edit the message. You can choose to preview your reply
by checking the preview box next to the Edit Message button.

How to Bold Text Within a Post
Sometimes you'll want to emphasize a word or phrase within a post.
Making the text bold is often a great way to do this.
<strong> this is bold text </strong>
Result: this is bold text

How to Create a Link That Opens in a New Window
Linking somewhere else will take them away from a post. Adding the
target="_blank" parameter will open a new window so that they never leave.
<a href="http://www.ezboard.com/" target="blank"> this link will
pop-up a new window</a>
Result: this link will pop-up a new window
[if you notice on all the links at the top of the messageboard...I
made it so that a new page will be opened for everyone's convenience]

How to Add an Image to Your Post
Perhaps one of the most popular tags used within posts.
<img src="http://www.ezboard.com/image/csc_goldcommunity.gif">
